alert.note: Alert for Delaware Beaches; Inland Sussex; Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 29 at 3:41AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Heavy snow will continue this morning with blizzard conditions near the coast... At 335 am, radar indicated heavy snow in much of central and southern New Jersey and portions of central and southern Delmarva, with an embedded band of intense snowfall near the coast. Snow rates of 1 to 3 inches per hour have been observed in much of the area, with the highest snowfall rates within the band near the coast. Meanwhile, winds have continued to increase near the coast, with webcams indicating whiteout conditions in many areas. These conditions are expected to persist through mid morning. Travel is strongly discouraged! If you must travel, bring a winter survival kit. If you become stranded, stay with your vehicle.
